landingPageIntro: Thank you for taking the time to review my city bike app and considering my work for your consideration. I am excited to showcase simple project with Chakra UI, React and JS that holds a special place in my heart. This was my technical interview project from a year ago, and I'm eager to showcase how far I've come since then!
mapPageIntro: An application that enables users to explore bike networks and stations across the globe, revealing their real-time availability. The primary emphasis was on managing API requests and retrieving dynamic information.
tipsTitle: Discover the world of city biking with our user-friendly app! It's as easy as 1-2-3:
tips1: Our map comes with three layers. The first one reveals the city's extensive bike network, allowing you to see all the available bike stations.
tips2: With just a click on any marker, you can quickly access the bike network stations in that area.
tips3: For a closer look, click on a specific station, and voil√†! All the essential details about that station will be at your fingertips.
welcome: Welcome to my City Bike app
loginWithGoogle: Login with Google or Github to enjoy all of our city bike app
